Plot: College sophomore Randy Bodek is unfocused. The only thing he knows is that he loves his roommate, Jenny Gordon, who feels unappreciated as other things in his life seem to take precedence ...
Title: Loverboy
Writer: Robin Schiff (story), Robin Schiff (screenplay), Tom Ropelewski (screenplay), Leslie Dixon (screenplay)
Actors: Patrick Dempsey, Kate Jackson, Robert Ginty, Nancy Valen
